search.description: Displayed in the main context menu, before the search string

folderNotFoundTitle.description: Title of the error notification displayed if main folder for context bookmarks is not found

folderNotFoundMessage.message:
Folder not found!

No folder that matches the title "$MAIN_FOLDER_NAME$" was found in the bookmarks.

Make sure, that this folder exists, or change the folder title in the extensions settings.
folderNotFoundMessage.description: The error notification displayed if main folder for context bookmarks is not found

childrenNotFoundTitle.description: Title of the error notification displayed if main folder for context bookmarks contains no bookmarks

childrenNotFoundMessage.message:
Bookmarks not found!

First folder that matches the title "$MAIN_FOLDER_NAME$" contains no bookmarks!

No menu items were created.
childrenNotFoundMessage.description: The error notification displayed if main folder for context bookmarks contains no bookmarks
